Name: Daze
Text: You may return an Island you control to its owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.\nCounter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie.\nWhen The Scarab God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.
